title: PBE Account
body:
Hey Guys,
I really wanna get a PBE account but I don't know how. I wanna start youtube and I am at 500 subs now and i think PBE may help me grow quicker.

replies.body:
You can sign up for PBE access [here.](https://pbesignup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) Be sure you've signed in to your EUW account before accessing that link, otherwise, you'll get a sad heimerdinger error. 

Additionally, ou can find our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) here, for any questions you may have about how the system works, how we choose candidates, etc.

Let me know if you have any questions!
